title: go.talks/present: Kill button doesn't work
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run go.talks/present locally
2. Open a slide with executable code (such as the concurrency one in 2012)
3. Run the first example. Click kill. The process keeps on running.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I expect to see a message saying that the process was killed.
